comments.body: `sorted` makes sure that the list elements are the same and takes care of Python `2.x, 3.x` order issue.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +51,55 @@        set_module_args(dict(vrf='ntc', afi='ipv4', safi='unicast', state='present'))
        result = self.execute_module(changed=True)
        self.assertEqual(sorted(result['commands']), sorted(['vrf context ntc',
                                                             'address-family ipv4 unicast',
                                                             'afi ipv4',
